<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_gf_goal_m2m_relationship</collection> <condition>!current.isActionAborted() && current.getValue('entity_id') != null;</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Sync Document ID with Work item</name> <order>60</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var tableToFieldMapping = { 'dmn_demand': 'demand', 'pm_project': 'project', 'pm_program': 'program', 'rm_epic': 'scrum_epic', 'sn_safe_epic': 'scrum_epic', 'rm_feature': 'scrum_feature', }; var planningItemTables = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_align_core') ? sn_gf.GFAlignCoreUtil.getAllPlanningItemAndStrategicItemTables() : []; var tableName = current.getValue("table_name"); var entityId = current.getValue('entity_id'); if (tableName in tableToFieldMapping && current.isValidField(tableToFieldMapping[tableName]) & current.getValue(tableToFieldMapping[tableName]) == null) { current.setValue(tableToFieldMapping[tableName], entityId); current.setValue('is_work_item', true); } else if ((new global.ArrayUtil()).contains(planningItemTables, tableName) && current.isValidField("planning_item_id") && current.getValue("planning_item_id") == null) { if (sn_gf.GFAlignCoreUtil.isValidPlanningItem(entityId)) current.setValue("planning_item_id", entityId); current.setValue('is_work_item', true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-08-21 12:50:59</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>198635a277023010a55229354f5a99d9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Sync Document ID with Work item</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Goal Framework" source="sn_gf">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Goal Framework">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_198635a277023010a55229354f5a99d9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-10 11:39:29</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=198635a277023010a55229354f5a99d9"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Sync Document ID with Work item
